question: how many side does this image show nice photo of parotid on with tumor capsule and obvious invasive tumor?
unified_answer: This image shows a section of tissue with features suggestive of a parotid gland tumor. A fibrous capsule is partially visible, along with adjacent parenchyma.  The image also shows infiltration of the surrounding tissue by the tumor.  It is not possible to determine the number of "sides" being shown, as this is a histologic section and not a gross specimen.
